name: Rallyallyally
description:
Rallyallyally is a stylized, multiplayer, last-man-standing racing game where up to 8 players compete over a series of rounds. Each round one player is randomly selected as the leader to make a new track that the others must follow. Slow players are eliminated until only one remains. It's fun, bold and exciting.



Battle it out by competing against up to 8 other players in each game, this also includes local parties with up to 4 players!



Scattered across the world are various items that can be used to gain an advantage against your opponents in the race!



Item Crates can be found around the world! Collect these to unlock awesome cosmetic items, to stand out from everyone else and show off your unique style!



There is a huge world for you to race through and explore interesting locations!
